title: Troll of Udun (6R106)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	10
Card Type:	Minion • Troll
Strength:	14
Vitality:	5
Site:	6
Game Text:	Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, this minion's twilight cost is -4. Skirmish: Discard a [Sauron] card from hand to make this minion strength +1.
Lore:	”'…Trolls are only counterfeits, made by the Enemy in the Great Darkness, in mockery of Ents….'”
Rarity:	R
